title: Sterling Generators collaborates with Pi Green for emission control device - Your Gateway to Power Transmission ... - T&D India
summary: Sterling Generators has partnered with Pi Green Innovations to launch a new emission control device called RECD. RECD uses filter-less technology to capture Particulate Matter (PM) from engine exhaust with over 70% efficiency. This device is designed to help businesses comply with pollution control board regulations and promotes sustainable energy solutions.

title: BMW Debuts More Powerful and Lighter F900GS For 2024 - ADV Pulse
summary: BMW has released a new lineup of adventure motorcycles, including the F900GS, F900GS Adventure, and F800GS. These models feature a more powerful engine, a lighter frame, and improved suspension. The F900GS in particular boasts a weight reduction of 31 lbs due to a new plastic fuel tank and a redesigned rear section.

title: Anand Group and Koreaâ€™s HL Group ink aftermarket JV, target rapid domestic and global growth - Autocar Professional
summary: The Anand Group, an Indian auto components manufacturer, has formed a joint venture with Korea's HL Group to expand their aftermarket business. The JV will focus on manufacturing and distributing automotive components for passenger vehicles, aiming to double Anand's aftermarket sales within five years. The partnership will leverage Anand's strong Indian network and HL Group's global sourcing expertise to capture the growing Indian and global aftermarket markets.

title: Pratik Agarwal, Managing Director, Sterlite Power - Your Gateway to Power Transmission & Distribution - T&D India
summary: Sterlite Power, a company specializing in power transmission, is experiencing increased demand for its products and services, particularly due to the global focus on decarbonization. The company has secured significant new orders, including a major project in Rajasthan, and is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing market for power transmission infrastructure. Sterlite Power's focus on sustainable solutions and its ability to execute complex projects are key drivers of its success.
